content.p: Looking to gain some work experience? It's a great way to develop your skills, get an insight into what jobs really involve and make contacts for the future. For some jobs and courses, it's imperative that you gain some experience in the workplace. These events focus on finding out what's on offer, how to apply and make the most of work placements, internships and the optional Placement Year. Some sessions are targeted at particular courses with other sessions open to all. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
